metadata.title: CVE-2024-35912 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: mvm: rfi: fix potential response leaksIf the rx payload length check fails, or if kmemdup() fails,we still need to free the command response. Fix that.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
